document_data.name: Circle of Steel
document_data.mainbody: The '''Circle of Steel''' was a famous all-female [[adventuring company]] in the early 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite polyhedron/58/The Everwinking Eye: Adventures in Maskyr's Eye|25}}{{Cite web enhancement/Environs of Waterdeep|9}}
document_data.History: In their youth, they dared to explore the ruins of [[Myth Drannor]] and, most impressively, lived to tell the tale. And indeed they did, for one member, Szuszalan, wrote of their exploits in her biography, ''[[Walking on a Swordblade]]'', published in the {{YearlinkName|1352}}.
